urls.description: Our employees are trained to assist our differently-abled passengers and for any sorts of limitations, we offer a wide variety of special assistance. data.text: @iamarya17 Hi Arya, we have received your DM, shall follow up there.

@iamarya17 Hi Arya, please note, SpiceJet does allow some food items on board. These include burgers, sandwiches, cold snacks, Dry sweets, cookies, and biscuits. Some items not allowed onboard due to hygiene issues are samosas, pakoras, gravies, or pickles.

data.text: #WeatherUpdate: Due to bad weather in Pondicherry (PNY), all departures/arrivals and their consequential flights may get affected. Passengers are requested to keep a check on their flight status via https://t.co/VkU7yLB2ny.

@Tarunba61839642 Kindly note, in the air transport sector, flights are rescheduled, delayed, diverted, and canceled due to operational reasons and other regulatory directives. They accordingly form a part of its terms of carriage. Please reach out to our staff for any immediate assistance.

@Tarunba61839642 Tarun, as checked, your flight is affected due to operational reasons and shall depart at 0200 hrs.  We always try our best to maintain departures as per schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face delays. Please contact our airport staff for any assistance.
@Arjun5garg Arjun, we'd request you to carry a hard copy of your id for verification purposes.

@AnkkitaC Kindly note, in the air transport sector, flights are rescheduled, delayed, diverted, and canceled due to operational reasons and other regulatory directives. They accordingly form a part of its terms of carriage. Please reach out to our staff for any immediate assistance.
